name: sharp-beak
effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Flying moves by 20%.
short_effect: Held: Flying-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a long, sharp beak that boosts the power of Flying-type moves.
flavor_text.platinum: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a long, sharp beak that boosts the power of Flying-type moves.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a long, sharp beak that boosts the power of Flying-type moves.
